value.title: IBM And The Overwatch League Are Using Watson AI To Figure Out The Best Player On Each Hero
value.excerpt: One of the best additions to the Overwatch League this year is the Power Rankings generated by IBM Watson. IBM Watson has been using AI to analyze hundreds of data points and generate weekly lists of the best-performing players and teams in the league.

value.title: Alphabet’s self-driving unit Waymo raises $2.5B in funding round
value.excerpt: Alphabet’s self-driving unit Waymo said on Wednesday it raised $2.5 billion in its fresh funding round in a year after a string of defections of executives rekindled concerns about

value.title: These cool robots can sing ‘Happy Birthday’ and even paint your nails
value.excerpt: From sexual companions to COVID-19 nurses, robots are increasingly dominating the human experience. They’re rolling into our everyday lives as digital sidekicks designed to more safely, efficiently and speedily take on our tasks.

value.title: Before the next pandemic: Lessons learned, and those still to be absorbed
value.excerpt: The post Before the next pandemic: Lessons learned, and those still to be absorbed appeared first on The AI Blog.

value.title: BME and BBF Fintech to stage sustainable finance hackathon

value.title: Facebook’s AI reverse-engineers models used to generate deepfakes
value.excerpt: Facebook and Michigan State University created a system capable of reverse-engineering models used to create deepfakes.

value.title: Automate Amazon SageMaker Studio setup using AWS CDK
value.excerpt: Amazon SageMaker Studio is the first fully integrated development environment (IDE) for machine learning (ML). Studio provides a single web-based visual interface where you can perform all ML development steps required to prepare data, as well as build, train, and deploy models. You can quickly upload

value.title: Self-driving trucks startup Kodiak Robotics snags investment, partnership from Bridgestone
value.excerpt: Tire-making giant Bridgestone has taken a minority stake in Kodiak Robotics, the Silicon Valley-based startup developing autonomous trucks, as part of a broader partnership to test and develop smart tire technology.

value.title: Amazon Alexa head scientist on developing trustworthy AI systems
value.excerpt: Amazon Alexa head scientist Rohit Prasad believes context is the key to more capable voice-driven AI systems -- and AI systems in general.

value.title: Stripe delves into identity verification—a major foray beyond financial services
value.excerpt: Stripe launched Stripe Identity, a standalone fraud prevention service that meets a core customer need and heeds off competition.

value.title: The Reality Behind The AI Illusion
value.excerpt: Being actively involved in the global AI community, I've noticed that many people still associate AI with sci-fi Hollywood movies displaying the distant future powered by intelligent robots and machines.

value.title: New workload sharing framework drives breakthroughs in AI-based application performance
value.excerpt: Intel Deep Link technology lets CPUs and GPUs run AI-powered applications at blazing speeds and without compromising the user experience.

value.title: Harnessing Healthcare’s Data Explosion With AI-Based Natural Language Processing
value.excerpt: By creating efficiencies that minimize tedious searches and deliver users the specific information they need when they need it, clinicians can spend less time on the computer and more time interacting with patients.

value.title: Is AI The Answer To Recruiting Effectiveness?
value.excerpt: Engaging a talent acquisition strategy that leverages today’s powerful technology with experienced human talent acquisition professionals will prove to be the most successful way to win the battle for top talent in the future.

value.title: Gloat, which uses AI to connect employees with internal work, raises $57M
value.excerpt: Gloat, which gives enterprises visibility into their employees' skills and enables them to fill roles internally, has raised $57 million.

value.title: Data’s Double Edges: How To Use Machine Learning To Solve The Problem Of Unused Data In Risk Management
value.excerpt: The world is awash in data, and data is there to be used — or not used — like at no other time. As a result, risk measurement systems today perform far better than the systems of even just three years ago.

value.title: To measure ultra-low power AI, MLPerf gets a TinyML benchmark
value.excerpt: The new suite of tests measures the latency and power consumption of an embedded system performing four representative machine learning tasks.

value.title: Trigo bags $10M for its computer-vision based checkout tech to rival Amazon’s ‘Just Walk Out’
value.excerpt: While Amazon continues to expand its self-service, computer-vision-based grocery checkout technology by bringing it to bigger stores, an AI startup out of Israel that’s built something to rival it has picked up funding and a new strategic investor as a customer.

value.title: Hungryroot's AI-Powered Personalized Grocery Service Reaches $750M Valuation
value.excerpt: Artificial intelligence (AI) is becoming a greater part of multiple industries, including groceries. Investments in AI are also increasing as more companies look to technology to remain competitive, and more consumers continue to shop online.

value.title: Mexican FinTech Credijusto Buys Bank To Serve X-Border SMBs
value.excerpt: Credijusto says it’s the first Mexican FinTech to buy a regulated bank, transforming itself into Latin America’s only neobank concentrated on working with small to medium-sized businesses (SMBs). “Our acquisition of Banco Finterra creates the first truly digital banking platform for Mexican [SMBs],
